mapper.insert: insert into tmi_member values ( seq_m_no.nextval, #{mEmail}, #{mNickName}, #{mPassword}, #{mName}, #{mPhone}, default)
mapper.update: update tmi_member set m_nickname = #{mNickName}, m_name = #{mName}, m_phone = #{mPhone} where m_email = #{mEmail}
mapper.select: select fb.fb_no, fb.fb_p_no, m.m_nickname, fb.fb_title, fb.fb_content, fb.fb_created_at, fb.fb_updated_at, fb.fb_read_count from tmi_friend_board fb join tmi_member m on fb_m_email = m.m_email where fb_m_email = #{fbMEmail} order by fb.fb_no desc
select count(*) from tmi_friend_board where fb_m_email = #{fbMEmail}
